DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate effect polyphenol supplementation plasma level prostaglandin E2 woman reproductive period .
DOC.brief_title: Polyphenols Supplementation Prostaglandin E2 Women - Randomized Clinical Trial
DOC.detailed_description: The effect anti-inflammatory substance constriction fetal ductus arteriosus well document , anti-inflammatory property polyphenols effect metabolism prostaglandins establish . Evidence indicate food rich polyphenols consume third trim pregnancy may interfere anatomical functional activity fetal heart , presumably action similar anti-inflammatory drug nonsteroidal , cause inhibitory effect prostaglandin synthesis . Objective : The objective study evaluate effect polyphenol supplementation plasma level prostaglandin E2 woman childbearing age use hormonal contraceptive . As secondary endpoint also evaluate marker inflammation oxidative stress . The selected woman randomize receive capsule polyphenol concentration 3000 mg / day placebo capsule consume daily fifteen day . Was applied dietary recall ass intake polyphenols , measure height weight carry blood sample prostaglandin analysis E2 ( PGE2 ) , high sensitive C-reactive protein , urine analysis total polyphenols F2 isoprostane ( 8 iso-PGF2a ) . Statistical analysis : The result express absolute relative frequency mean ± standard deviation ( SD ) median interquartile range . For analysis , Pearson correlation use . To compare mean use Student 's test . The level significance 5 % . Considering 90 % power , absolute error margin 5 % present study , 13 patient need group .
DOC.criteria: Women age 25 35 Use hormonal contraceptive Agreed participate sign Informed Consent Pregnant woman Use antiinflammatory drug Using supplementation omega 3 BMI high 30 kg / m² Previous diagnosis diabetes mellitus , hypertension , dyslipidemia , malignancy infection
